history.proof: intros T H H0 t. destruct H0 as [H0']. qsimpl time: 1 use: lift_lift_fuse. sauto l: on depth: 3use: lift_lift_fuse.

exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type H : Lift T H0' : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), s <= k <= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift (wk + ws) s t t : T The term "H" has type "Lift T" while it is expected to have type "nat".

In environment T : Type H : Lift T t : T H1 : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), s <= k -> k <= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift (wk + ws) s t H0 : forall t k s wk ws : nat, s <= k -> k <= s + ws -> (if le_gt_dec k (if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) then wk + (if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) else if le_gt_dec s t then ws + t else t) = (if le_gt_dec s t then wk + ws + t else t) Unable to unify "shift 0 (shift 0 t)" with "shift 1 (shift 0 t)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), LiftLiftFuse -> forall t : T, shift 1 (shift 0 t) = shift 0 (shift 0 t)

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Record Lift (T : Type) : Type := Build_Lift { lift : nat -> nat -> T -> T } Arguments Lift _%type_scope Arguments Build_Lift [T]%type_scope _%function_scope
Notation shift := (lift 1)
Record LiftLiftFuse (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftLiftFuse { lift_lift_fuse : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), s <= k <= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift (wk + ws) s t } Arguments LiftLiftFuse {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftLiftFuse [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Build_Rotate1SelfInverse : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall t : T, rotate 1 (rotate 1 t) = t) -> Rotate1SelfInverse
Build_LiftZero : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (k : nat) (t : T), lift 0 k t = t) -> LiftZero
Build_SubstLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t) -> SubstLift
closed = fun (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (k : nat) (t : T) => shift k t = t : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> T -> Prop Arguments closed {T}%type_scope {H} _%nat_scope
Build_Pun2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t) -> Pun2
Build_Pun1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) (S k) (shift k t) = t) -> Pun1
Build_LiftLiftFuse : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), s <= k <= s + ws -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift (wk + ws) s t) -> LiftLiftFuse
Record Rotate1SelfInverse (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_Rotate1SelfInverse { rotate1_self_inverse : forall t : T, rotate 1 (rotate 1 t) = t } Arguments Rotate1SelfInverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_Rotate1SelfInverse [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
rotate = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) (n : nat) (t : T) => subst (var n) 0 (shift (S n) t) : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Lift T -> Subst V T -> nat -> T -> T Arguments rotate {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} _%nat_scope
lift_preserves_closed : LiftLift -> forall k t : nat, closed k t -> closed (S k) (shift 0 t)
Rotate1SelfInverse_Algebraic = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Lift V) (T : Type) (H1 : Lift T) (H2 : Subst V V) (H3 : Subst V T) (H4 : LiftVar) (H5 : SubstVar) (H6 : LiftLift) (H7 : LiftSubst2) (H8 : SubstSubst) (H9 : Pun2) => {| rotate1_self_inverse := fun t : T => eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => subst (var 1) 0 t0 = t) (eq_ind (shift 2 (shift 2 t)) (fun t0 : T => subst (var 1) 0 (subst (shift 2 (var 1)) 0 t0) = t) (eq_ind_r (fun v : V => subst (var 1) 0 (subst v 0 (shift 2 (shift 2 t))) = t) (eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => t0 = t) (...
Record SubstLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstLift { subst_lift : forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t } Arguments SubstLift {T}%type_scope {H} {V}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_SubstLift [T]%type_scope _ [V]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
fold_closed : forall k t : nat, shift k t = t -> closed k t
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
Record LiftZero (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftZero { lift_zero : forall (k : nat) (t : T), lift 0 k t = t } Arguments LiftZero {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftZero [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record Pun1 (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_Pun1 { pun_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) (S k) (shift k t) = t } Arguments Pun1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_Pun1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record Pun2 (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_Pun2 { pun_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t } Arguments Pun2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_Pun2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftLift : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)) -> LiftLift
Build_PunPun : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> PunPun
Build_LiftInjective : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2) -> LiftInjective
Build_LiftSubst2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> LiftSubst2
Build_LiftSubst1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)) -> LiftSubst1
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
subst_lift : forall (v : ?V) (k : nat) (t : ?T), subst v k (shift k t) = t where ?T : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?T] ?V : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?SubstLift : [ |- SubstLift]
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
subst_preserves_closed : LiftSubst2 -> forall k v t : nat, closed k v -> closed (S k) t -> closed k (subst v 0 t)
pun_2 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?Pun2 : [ |- Pun2]
pun_1 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat), subst (var k) (S k) (shift k t) = t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?Pun1 : [ |- Pun1]
Record PunPun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_PunPun { pun_pun : forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments PunPun {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_PunPun [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
Record LiftLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftLift { lift_lift : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) } Arguments LiftLift {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftLift [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Nat.eq_add_1 : forall n m : nat, n + m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 0 \/ n = 0 /\ m = 1
rotate1_self_inverse : forall t : ?T, rotate 1 (rotate 1 t) = t where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Var ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?Rotate1SelfInverse : [ |- Rotate1SelfInverse]
Nat.divide_1_r_nonneg : forall n : nat, 0 <= n -> Nat.divide n 1 -> n = 1
Record LiftInjective (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftInjective { lift_injective : forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments LiftInjective {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftInjective [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg' : forall n m : nat, 0 <= m -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\ m = 1
Record LiftSubst1 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst1 { lift_subst_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) } Arguments LiftSubst1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope

```coq
intros T H H0 t. destruct H0 as [H0'].
apply (lift_lift_fuse T H H0' t 1 0 1 0).
split; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros T H H0 t. destruct H0 as [H0']. apply (lift_lift_fuse T H H0' t 1 0 1 0). split; auto.
